definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Their basic aim is to delight and instruct.
sentences.chinese: 這些畫的底子目標是給人娛悅和教誨。

sentences.english: China is the most populous nation with vulnerable environment and under-developed productivity.
sentences.chinese: 是中國人口衆多，底子薄，生產力不發達。

sentences.english: He has a good grounding in Chinese.
She added that having conversations with friends wasn't helpful at all.
sentences.chinese: 她增補說合伴侶會話底子沒用。

sentences.english: The property is of foundamental spiritual and cultural value to such countries.
sentences.chinese: 這種財富對這些國傢俱有思想與文化的底子價值。

sentences.english: But there was still an industrial bedrock.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們仍舊有工業底子。

sentences.english: Obama's clean slate would give him the latitude to build positive ties from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬底子清白，因此可以從一開始就建立積極關係。

sentences.english: Eric has a dancing background. Hence he will perform more dancing in the anniversary show.
sentences.chinese: 孫耀威跳舞底子不差，所以今次賀臺慶特別加碼演出。

sentences.english: You know Ijust think they didnt see the talent that Ihad.
sentences.chinese: 我想，他們底子沒瞅見我的先天。

sentences.english: He was a Purchasing Manager, and very familiar with Business English.
sentences.chinese: 曾任採購經理的他，有十分深厚的商業英文底子。

sentences.english: He was dressed in a European-style suit of a pale grey material with pale-blue stripes.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一身淺灰色底子淡藍色條紋的西褲。

sentences.english: I didn't realize I should have given it to you as soon as it arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我底子出有唸到貨運單一到就應當給你收去。

sentences.english: The wall was first pricked up with a coat lime.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁先抹上一層石灰打底子。

sentences.english: Jupiter and Saturn will work to help you set up a firm foundation for your future.
sentences.chinese: 木星和土星將聯手襄助爲未來的生奠定堅實的底子。

sentences.english: In incremental improvement, the basic platform is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 採用漸進式改善，基本的平臺底子總是不變的。

sentences.english: Will you get me a quite plain parasol ?
sentences.chinese: 你替我買把小陽傘行嗎？要素底子的。

definition: foundation/grounding/background/what lies at the bottom of sth/root/cause
training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
to lay (a foundation)/to conquer (a city etc)/to shoot down (a bird etc)
not up to much/very indifferent/nothing great about it/nothing good to be said about it
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
